alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:48PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Webb County through 745 PM CDT... At 648 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chupadera Ranch Airport to 8 miles west of Las Tiendas. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chupadera Ranch Airport and La Esperanza Ranch Airport. This includes US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 676. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
